[@microsoft/fast-element](../fast-element/index.html) &gt; [View](../fast-element.view/index.html)

## View interface

Represents a collection of DOM nodes which can be bound to a data source.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export interface View<TSource = any, TParent = any> extends Disposable 
```
**Extends:** [Disposable](../fast-element.disposable/)

</th></tr></thead>

[bind(source, context)](../fast-element.view.bind/)


</td><td>

</td></tr>
